title: AI Practical Competency Enhancement: Reflective Educational Design for Realizing Social Justice

context.prior_knowledge: Awareness of basic social issues and professional work experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: After course completion, learners can analyze social inequality cases and explain at least three structural causes
Learners can identify social justice issues in their professional domains and develop reflective practice plans
Through collaborative learning, learners can propose action plans incorporating social responsibility awareness during peer evaluation and feedback processes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
